§ 7301. Presidential regulations The President may prescribe regulations for the conduct of employees in the executive branch. (Pub. L. 89–554, Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 524.)
Historical and Revision Notes
DerivationU.S. CodeRevised Statutes andStatutes at Large
5 U.S.C. 631 (last 16 words).R.S. § 1753 (last 16 words).
The words “employees in the executive branch” are substituted for “persons who may receive appointments in the civil service”. Standard changes are made to conform with the definitions applicable and the style of this title as outlined in the preface to the report.
